sentences.en: "I want to send a telegram." — "Fine, to whom?"
sentences.cn: “我想发份电报。”——“好的，发给谁？”

sentences.en: "Steve, what do you want?" — "Coke, Pepsi, it doesn't matter."
sentences.cn: “史蒂夫，你要喝点什么？”——“可口可乐，百事，随便啦。”

sentences.en: All I want is the chance to prove myself.
sentences.cn: 我只想有个机会证明自己。

sentences.en: for want of a better location we ate our picnic lunch in the cemetery.
sentences.cn: 由于没有更好的地方，我们只好在墓地吃野餐。

sentences.en: He didn’t want the holiday to end.
sentences.cn: 他不希望假期结束。

sentences.en: He goes to me: "Oh, what do you want?"
sentences.cn: 他问我：“哦，你想要什么？”

sentences.en: He wanted that job so badly he was willing to kill for it.
sentences.cn: 他非常想得到那份工作，哪怕要为此去杀人他都愿意。

sentences.en: I don't want any more of that heavy stuff.
sentences.cn: 我再也不想碰那种麻烦事了。

sentences.en: I don't want him to feel forsaken and unhappy.
sentences.cn: 我不想让他感到被抛弃而不快乐。

sentences.en: I don’t want Linda to hear about this.
sentences.cn: 我不想让琳达听到这事。

sentences.en: I know of no one who would want to murder Albert.
sentences.cn: 我没听说有人想杀艾伯特。

sentences.en: I really want a drink.
sentences.cn: 我很想喝一杯。

sentences.en: I want the manager'sjob when he calls it a day.
sentences.cn: 等到经理不干了之后，我想接替他的位子。

sentences.en: If she doesn’t get what she wants, she’s not happy.
sentences.cn: 她要是得不到想要的就不开心。

sentences.en: It's almost a foregone conclusion that you'll get what you want.
sentences.cn: 你将得到你想要的，这几乎是确定无疑的。

sentences.en: Mary Ann doesn't want to have children. Not right now, anyway.
sentences.cn: 玛丽·安不想要孩子，至少现在不想。

sentences.en: Now let me see, who's the man we want?
sentences.cn: 现在让我看一看，谁是我们要找的人？

sentences.en: Oh thank you, it’s just what I’ve always wanted.
sentences.cn: 啊，谢谢你，这正是我一直想要的。

sentences.en: People want to dissect his work and question his motives.
sentences.cn: 人们想仔细分析他的作品，并对他的动机提出质疑。

sentences.en: Politicians want a lap-dog press which will uncritically report their propaganda.
sentences.cn: 政客们想要的是不问是非、甘为他们搞宣传的哈巴狗一样的新闻媒体。

sentences.en: She spent her life pandering to the wants of her children.
sentences.cn: 她一生都在设法满足子女的需要。

sentences.en: She’d always wanted to go to Thailand.
sentences.cn: 她一直想去泰国。

sentences.en: The cat wants out.
sentences.cn: 这只猫想要出去

sentences.en: The difference between who you are and who you want to be is what you do.
sentences.cn: 你是什么样的人和你想成为什么样的之间的差距就是，你做了什么。

sentences.en: The dog wants in.
sentences.cn: 这条狗想要进去

sentences.en: The gallery closed down for want of funding.
sentences.cn: 那家画廊由于缺乏资金关闭了。

sentences.en: The owners don't want to overlook any opportunity to make a buck.
sentences.cn: 老板们不想错过任何可以赚钱的机会。

sentences.en: They desperately wanted a son.
sentences.cn: 他们非常想要个儿子。

sentences.en: This shampoo is mild enough to use every day if you want.
sentences.cn: 这种洗发液很温和，你想天天用都可以。

sentences.en: What do you want for your birthday?
sentences.cn: 你生日想要什么礼物？

sentences.en: What I want to know is when we’re going to get paid.
sentences.cn: 我想知道的是我们何时能拿到报酬。

sentences.en: When life gets hard and you want to give up, remember that life is full of ups and downs, and without the downs, the ups would mean nothing.
sentences.cn: 当生活很艰难，你想要放弃的时候，请记住，生活充满了起起落落，如果没有低谷，那站在高处也失去了意义。

sentences.en: You can order whatever you want.
sentences.cn: 你想要什么随便点。

words.tran_cn: 欠缺的；不足的；不够格的

phrases.tran_cn: 试一试；想试试，想要试一试
需要：希望加入某项工程、业务或其它事情
想要出去：希望离开某项工程、业务或其他事情
你想要什么；你想怎么样
无论你要什么；不管你想要什么

trans.tran_cn: 想要的东西，缺乏，极度贫困
trans.tran_en: used to say that you do not have or cannot find what you need in a particular situation
to have a desire for something

trans.tran_cn: 需要，想要，打算，通缉，照料
trans.tran_en: to have a desire for something
